title: Frozen force yasuo.
body:
The single things making this build obnoxious are fervor of battle or warlord not the build itself.
Without them he is just a bruiser and before u say yas should not be tanky remember he was designed as a fighter/assassin so he is not {{champion:121}} type.

replies.body: Fervor + Trinity enable the build, take either out and the build becomes nonviable.
Warlord's bloodlust is terrible on Frozen Force Yasuo.
